testcase.name: EventsController get :new should response ok and render job_offers/new
HomeController default should return Comming soon!
SessionsController get : should response ok
SessionsController get : should render users/login
UsersController get :register should response ok
UsersController get :register should render users/new
Event model should respond to #id
Event model should respond to #startdate
Event model should respond to #fertilePeriod
Event model should respond to #owner
Event owner should have owner
Event String format should return a string 6-5-2013
Event Next event should return a date 2013/5/28
Event Next event should return a date 17-1-2014 when change of year
Event Fertile period of event should return the date 2013-5-17 and 2013-5-21
Event Fertile period of event should return the date 2014-1-5 and 2014-1-9 when change of year
Event Fertile period of event should return the date 2013-6-17 and 2013-6-21 when change of month
User model should respond to #id
User model should respond to #name
User model should respond to #crypted_password
User model should respond to #email
User valid? should be false when name is blank
User valid? should be false when email is not valid
User valid? should be false when password is blank
User valid? should be false when password does not contain lowercase chars
User valid? should be false when password does not contain uppercase chars
User valid? should be false when password contains no digit
User valid? should be false when password length is < 8
User valid? should be true when all field are valid
User authenticate should return nil when password do not match
User authenticate should return nil when email do not match
User authenticate should return the user when email and password match
